    • storeAsReference

      public Modification storeAsReference(Resource resource, Object node, String name, String[] values, int type, boolean multiValued) throws PersistenceException
      Stores property value(s) as reference(s). Will parse the reference(s) from the string value(s) in the RequestProperty.
      Parameters:
      resource - resource
      node - the node
      name - the name
      values - the value
      type - the type
      multiValued - if multiValued
      Returns:
      true only if parsing was successful and the property was actually changed
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - if the operation cannot be executed

    • setTypedProperty

      public void setTypedProperty(Object n, String name, String[] values, int type, boolean multiValued) throws PersistenceException
